title: Agency use in Building services / DLO

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
1) Please can you confirm how many agency operatives are currently working in the DLO / Building services team?
2) Please can you confirm how many agency operatives have worked in the DLO/ Building services team in the past 12 months?
3) Can you also confirm how many of those have been procured via Reed?
4) Which department/ team or manager is the largest user of agency staff?
Thanks
Matt

Dear Matthew Swift,
Thank you for your request for information relating to agency use in
Building services / DLO which we received on 10/11/2023.
Please find Sheffield City Council’s response to your request set out
below:
1) Please can you confirm how many agency operatives are currently working
in the DLO / Building services team?
As at 30/09/2023, we had 60 agency staff working in the Housing Repairs
Service in Sheffield City Council.
2) Please can you confirm how many agency operatives have worked in the
DLO/ Building services team in the past 12 months?
Between 01/10/2022 and 30/09/2023 there have been 110 agency staff in the
Housing Repairs Service in Sheffield City Council.
3) Can you also confirm how many of those have been procured via Reed?
41 were procured via the master vendor contract with REED.
4) Which department/ team or manager is the largest user of agency staff?
Responsive Repairs Team in the Housing Repairs Service.
If you have any queries about this response, please do not hesitate to
contact us.
